title: The Geometry of Loop Spaces IV: Closed Sasakian Manifolds
abstract:
We construct a one-parameter family of pairwise non-isometric metrics
$h_{\rho}, \rho > 0,$ on any closed Sasakian manifold $M^{4k+1}$ such that
$\pi_1({\rm Isom}(M, h_\rho))$ is infinite. On $S^{4k+1}$, $h_0$ is the
standard metric, so $\pi_1({\rm Isom}(S^{4k+1}, h_\rho)) = {\mathbb Z}_2$ is
finite only at $\rho = 0.$ We also give a new proof that $\pi_1({\rm
Diff}_{\eta,str} (S^{4k+1}))$ is infinite, where ${\rm Diff}_{\eta,str}
(S^{4k+1})$ is the infinite dimensional group of diffeomrophisms which are
strict contact transformations of the standard contact structure on $S^{4k+1}.$
